mapper.insert: insert into h_dbc_profiles(profile_name, profile_desc, created_at) values (#{profileName}, #{profileDesc}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: select a.profile_name AS "profileName", a.profile_desc AS "profileDesc", a.created_at AS "createdAt", a.updated_at AS "updatedAt" from h_dbc_profiles a order by a.profile_name
mapper.insert: insert into h_dbc_acc_profiles(app, username, profile_name) values (#{app}, #{username}, #{profileName})
mapper.select: select a.profile_name AS "profileName", a.profile_desc AS "profileDesc", a.created_at AS "createdAt", a.updated_at AS "updatedAt", b.username AS "username" from h_dbc_profiles a, h_dbc_acc_profiles b where a.profile_name = b.profile_name and a.profile_name = #{name}
mapper.delete: delete from h_dbc_profiles where profile_name in (select profile_name from h_dbc_acc_profiles where app = #{app} and username = #{username} and profile_name = #{profileName})
delete from h_dbc_config where profile_name in (select profile_name from h_dbc_acc_profiles where app = #{app} and username = #{username} and profile_name = #{profileName})
